duration_in_months: Elections Canada may extend the initial term by up to 6 months
full_summary:
# Task-Based Information Professional Services
## Overview
The Office of the Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (Elections Canada) is inviting qualified Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) suppliers to submit proposals for the provision of IT professional services on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Background
Elections Canada requires IT professional services to support its ongoing activities and initiatives in the National Capital Region (NCR). The services are expected to be provided by a supplier having the appropriate expertise and infrastructure to meet Elections Canada's specific requirements.

## Scope of Work
The scope of work includes providing IT professional services across various categories, including Application Services and Information Management/IT Services. The exact services required will be specified in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.

## Term and Conditions
The contract period will be from the Effective Date to March 31, 2026, with up to three additional periods of two years each, subject to elections Canada exercising its irrevocable options.

## Security Requirements
The security requirements for this project include adhering to the Common PS SRCL #19, with a minimum corporate security requirement of DOS - Reliability and a minimum resource security requirement of Reliability status.

## Procurement Method
The procurement method will be Competitive-Selective Tendering.

## Regions of Opportunity
This project is intended to take place in the National Capital Region (NCR).

## Selection Criteria
The selection criteria will be outlined in the RFP document.

## Clarifications and Amendments
For any clarifications or amendments, please refer to the attached RFP document.

## Contact Information
For any further information or clarification, please contact Galina Zhukov at proposal-proposal@elections.ca or call (873) 416-1830.

## Language and Language Notice
The RFP document and all related information will be communicated in both official languages of Canada.

## Attachments
No attachments are provided with this notice.

Estimated number of contracts to be awarded: 3. All SA Holders that have been qualified for Streams and Categories have been invited to submit a proposal.
